biography_text: BRIDENSTINE, Jim, a Representative from Oklahoma; born in Ann Arbor, Washtenaw County, Mich., June 15, 1975; graduated from Jenks High School, Tulsa, Okla., 1993; B.A., Rice University, Houston, Texas, 1998; M.B.A., Cornell University, Ithaca, N.Y., 2009; United States Navy, 1998-2007; United States Navy Reserve, 2010-present; defense consultant; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Thirteenth and to the two succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2013-present).
